page.title: 05THE BREALEY LANGUAGE CENTRE
page.content: THE BREALEY LANGUAGE CENTRE IS THE MOST SPECTACULAR PLACE OF INTEREST IN SLEAFORD.IT IS HOUSED AT ST GEORGES SCHOOL AND COST WITH EQUIPMENT ABOUT Â£600,000.IT WAS SET UP BY THE BREALEY TRUST ORIGINALLY FOR THE TEACHING OF FRENCH,BUT CHANGED TO COMPUTER ASSISTED LEARNING AND CAN NOW TEACH ANY SUBJECT. THE BREALEY LANGUAGE CENTRE IS UNIQUE IN BRITAIN AND HAS THE LARGEST COMPUTER NETWORK IN THE COUNTRY.THIS CONSISTS OF INTERACTIVE LEARNING AND AUDIO ENHANCED LEARNING FACILITIES.IT USES BASIC AND MICRO TEXT COMPUTER LANGUAGES.THE PRIMARY FUNCTION OF THE CENTRE IS TO HELP IN EDUCATION. {BY KEVIN McTIEIRNAN.(AGE 15) {
